name: engine_activation_test_suite

boot_tests.description: Ensures kernel, modules, and engines load in the correct order.

signal_pipeline_test.description: Tests the flow from raw input → signal detection → routing.
sample_input: I feel unsafe when things change suddenly.
I try to keep control of my environment.

vector_engine_test.description: Ensures signals correctly update dimensional vectors.

stress_system_test.description: Validates stress overrides + stress integration behave correctly.

conflict_engine_test.description: Verifies conflict recognition and resolution pathways.

interpretation_engine_test.description: Ensures motives, identity, stress, and conflict interpretations assemble properly.

output_compiler_test.description: Tests whether the system can assemble the full final report structure.

notes: These tests validate that the entire psychological engine loads, processes, interprets, and outputs without structural failure before being used for live profiling.
